content.rendered:
Director's Message

Er. Rutuja Nawade

Director

Director’s Message

Welcome to the AVIC Projects (India) Pvt Ltd. To begin with, I would like to express my heartfelt gratitude to our esteemed clientele, financers, bankers and also to record my sincere appreciation for the employees who work diligently and deliver the projects to everyone’s delight. Further, I would also like to thank you all for visiting our profile and learning about our Victorious Voyage in the construction business.

Our objective is to achieve excellence through people empowerment, embracing High Technologies and providing a comprehensive suite of services for our clients and Enhance sustainability in the building supply chain. Reduce climate impact and strengthen climate resilience of the buildings and construction sector. We continue to strive for business excellence through total commitment to Quality and Close client Relationship.

The construction industry is a key player in achieving the UN’s Sustainable Development Goals. We AVIC Projects (India) Pvt Ltd committed to complete the United Nations Goals. Economic growth, social development and climate action are heavily dependent upon investments in infrastructure. This includes roads and bridges, information and communication technologies, sanitation services and utilities infrastructure – the basic needs of every country.

As a leader of the team, I have total faith in my team members and will guide them to personnel and professional success and fulfilment.

In coming years, we plan to explore and expand our potential by contributing to the glorious infrastructure development of the nation. We at AVIC Projects (India) Pvt Ltd stand for unprecedented growth and extraordinary commitment to making a better tomorrow.

Together we will achieve our goals. We dedicate our sincere and quality service always. I’m confident that with our versatile, adaptable and technology led efforts, we will meet the exacting standards of our clients.

builder_content:
Director's Message

Er. Rutuja Nawade

Director

Director’s Message

Welcome to the AVIC Projects (India) Pvt Ltd. To begin with, I would like to express my heartfelt gratitude to our esteemed clientele, financers, bankers and also to record my sincere appreciation for the employees who work diligently and deliver the projects to everyone’s delight. Further, I would also like to thank you all for visiting our profile and learning about our Victorious Voyage in the construction business.

Our objective is to achieve excellence through people empowerment, embracing High Technologies and providing a comprehensive suite of services for our clients and Enhance sustainability in the building supply chain. Reduce climate impact and strengthen climate resilience of the buildings and construction sector. We continue to strive for business excellence through total commitment to Quality and Close client Relationship.

The construction industry is a key player in achieving the UN’s Sustainable Development Goals. We AVIC Projects (India) Pvt Ltd committed to complete the United Nations Goals. Economic growth, social development and climate action are heavily dependent upon investments in infrastructure. This includes roads and bridges, information and communication technologies, sanitation services and utilities infrastructure – the basic needs of every country.

As a leader of the team, I have total faith in my team members and will guide them to personnel and professional success and fulfilment.

In coming years, we plan to explore and expand our potential by contributing to the glorious infrastructure development of the nation. We at AVIC Projects (India) Pvt Ltd stand for unprecedented growth and extraordinary commitment to making a better tomorrow.

Together we will achieve our goals. We dedicate our sincere and quality service always. I'm confident that with our versatile, adaptable and technology led efforts, we will meet the exacting standards of our clients.
